header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.description: These are general FAQs. If youâ€™re looking for more in-depth answers, head over to our extended FAQ page.

faqs.question: What is a web application?
faqs.answer: A web application is an application that runs on a web server and can be accessed via a web browser.

faqs.question: What about privacy?
faqs.answer: We take privacy seriously and comply with GDPR legislation.

faqs.question: The versions of EasyFWD.
faqs.answer: There are three versions of EasyFWD: Bronze, Silver, and Gold.

faqs.question: What does the vitality meter say?
faqs.answer: The vitality meter indicates how vital you are.

faqs.question: How do I order EasyFWD?
faqs.answer: You can order EasyFWD through our website.

cta.title: Still have questions?
